General.Name: Shenzhen Everwin Precision Tech
General.Description: Shenzhen Everwin Precision Technology Co., Ltd. development, production, and sale of electronic connectors and smart electronic products in China and internationally. It offers smart device components, such as metal bands, foldable parts and gears, components, stamping parts, connectors, injections, antennas, waveguide filters, and LED holders; EV components, including battery mechanics, power distribution systems, precision auto electronics, and metal bipolar plates for hydrogen fuel cell; and industrial robot, automation, and internet products. The company was founded in 2001 is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

5.Name: Mr. Yu Long  Hu
5.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
